```{r}
library(ggplot2)

```

```{r}
orange<-read.table("http://factominer.free.fr/book/orange.csv",header = TRUE,sep = ";",dec = ".",row.names = 1)
str(orange)
View(orange)
```

```{r}
res.pca<-PCA(orange,quanti.sup=8:14,quali.sup=15:16)
```
